title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Understanding Photodynamic Cancer Therapy Principles and Cutting-Edge Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of cancer treatment methods (e.g., chemotherapy, radiation therapy)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of photodynamic therapy and its advantages over conventional treatments
Learners can quantitatively understand the relationship between photosensitizers and singlet oxygen generation
Learners can explain how machine learning-based predictive models (SVR-PSO) are utilized in photodynamic therapy research
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
